MS MCQs

    Introduction to MLOps for IoT Edge

    »

    1. If you want to deploy MLOps, what is the correct sequence of deployment?

      Build and Train; Package and Deploy; Monitor and Retrain

      Monitor and Retrain; Package and Deploy; Build and Train

      Package and Deploy; Monitor and Retrain; Build and Train


    2. MLOps brings the philosophy of DevOps to the Data science community. In the absence of MLOPs, how would the work of a data scientist be impacted?

      A data scientist won’t be able to conduct experiments.

      A data scientist won’t be able to test models.

      A data scientist wouldn’t be able to collaborate with developers efficiently.


    3. A company has decided to implement MLOps on Edge devices. Which step would they need to implement before deploying MLOPs on Edge devices?

      The company should deploy IoT Edge and capture data from sensors.

      The company should be able to visualize data from sensors.

      Developers should follow CI/CD processes before MLOps is deployed.
